alert.note: Alert for Cooper; Pettis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 2:46AM CDT until June 08 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Pettis County in central Missouri... Southwestern Cooper County in central Missouri... * Until 330 AM CDT. * At 246 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Houstonia to Sedalia to near Green Ridge, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sedalia, Smithton, Green Ridge, Otterville, Bunceton, Sedalia Memorial Arpt and Clifton City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
